original_text: And he said to David, Thou art more righteous than I: for thou hast rewarded me good, whereas I have rewarded thee evil.
korean_text: 다윗에게 이르되 나는 너를 학대하되 너는 나를 선대하니 너는 나보다 의롭도다

sentences.original_text: Thou art more righteous than I:
for thou hast rewarded me good,
whereas I have rewarded thee evil.
